name: The Librarian (TheChosenGiraffe)
description:
The Librarian is a fantasy adventure kinetic  novel. It follows an author that moves out to a small village in order to gain inspiration for their next novel. As they are shown around by the local tavern owner, they get a warning to stay away from a mysterious building.

Curiosity overtakes the author and they discover a library owned by an eccentric and mysterious librarian. What follows next is an adventure worth writing about. 

Features over 20k words, flavor choices, three lovable characters, 4 CGs, and more! If you'd like to talk about the game, join the Discord server!

Characters:

MC: You are the main character. Will you survive this journey or are you going to find that some tales are too dangerous?

Andri: The mysterious librarian that has a knack for annoying people. Will he ever reveal his true motives?

Xingshe: The lovable himbo dragon with a sad look in his eyes. Is he more than he says he is?
